ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Lol! Figures someone at UCR would know about cows. Actually should a UC Davis person be responding to this? ... I feel your pain. You d feel better if you
ygData.messageBody:

Lol! Figures someone at UCR would know about cows. Actually should a UC
Davis person be responding to this?

> Robynn, at school and suffering her way through the last week of
> classes and on towards finals week.
>
> --
> Katy Westerman Don't lick something unless
> katyw@... you really mean it.
>
> http://www.cs.ucr.edu/~katyw -Advice from the Naked
> CS/Comp Math Major, UC Riverside Dancing Llama

I feel your pain. You'd feel better if you sang your Hymn with a mandolin in
your finals. Since it's a group thing, actually, I think everyone would.
Heal sister!

Windleaf, 23rd level Bard on Bertox (who's going crazy at work!)
